tool_description: Get the latest crypto news direct from your preferred sources (fast & reliable). News sources will be continuously added.
name: Cryptocurrency News
title: Cryptocurrency News

api_list.name: CoinDesk
api_list.description: Get the top latest news from CoinDesk.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news2.p.rapidapi.com/v1/coindesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
